Experience

Media Spokeswoman

Antonia worked for 10 years in media roles for the European Commission, planning media events, briefing journalists and giving radio and TV interviews.

Comms strategies for NGOs

Using a combination of the audit approach and strategic communications to help NGOs identify communication priorities and build their strategy accordingly.

Rewriting academic research

Working with academics to identify the core message of their work and find ways to communicate that message to those in the field that can use it in their practice.
